meeting_info.organization: Dallas City Council Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, TX and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the March 5, 2024, Workforce, Education and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Independent School District Equity Efforts Update
agenda_items.description: Update on equity efforts by the Dallas Independent School District.

agenda_items.title: Human Rights Commission April 2024 Update
agenda_items.description: Follow-up, engagement, feedback, and findings from the Human Rights Commission.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Christina Da Silva, Chris Graves

agenda_items.title: Presentation Regarding the Impact of Equity in the Dallas Business Sector
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the impact of equity in the business sector.
agenda_items.presenter: Sarah Cotton Nelson, Coda Rayo-Garza, Drexell Owusu

agenda_items.title: Welcoming Strategy Update
agenda_items.description: Insights from the Certified Welcoming Dallas Audit and Welcoming Interactive Conference.
agenda_items.presenter: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Christina Da Silva

agenda_items.title: Proposed Contract for Council Consideration
agenda_items.description: Multimedia Messaging Platform for Woman, Infants, and Children (WIC) Outreach and Scheduling Support.

agenda_items.title: Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS (HOPWA) Renewal and Contract Increase
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the renewal and increase of the HOPWA contract.
